data.text:
Climate Change, Weather and Environment Reports / Data for Siripani Ahom Pathar

Climate, Environment and Weather data, climate change reports etc. for Siripani Ahom Pathar is available as professional paid service. You may contact us for further details and sample data.

A brief summary of available data for Siripani Ahom Pathar is given below:

Social Structure of Siripani Ahom Pathar

As per available data from the year 2009, 196 persons live in 41 house holds in the village Siripani Ahom Pathar. There are 100 female individuals and 96 male individuals in the village. Females constitute 51.02% and males constitute 48.98% of the total population.

Population density of Siripani Ahom Pathar is 232.48 persons per square kilometer.

Land and Natural Resources in Siripani Ahom Pathar

Maps, reports and datasets of Siripani Ahom Pathar on topography, land use land cover(LULC), watershed / hydrological parameters etc. are available as a professional paid service. Please contact us for further details.

Total area of Siripani Ahom Pathar is 84.31 Hectares as per the data available for the year 2009.

Total sown/agricultural area is 62.2 ha. About 62.2 ha is un-irrigated area.

About 22.11 ha is covered by barren and un-cultivable land.

Schools in Siripani Ahom Pathar

There are no private or government pre-primary schools in the village. However, there is a government pre-primary school in Lalung, which is less than 5 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.

There is a government primary school in the village Siripani Ahom Pathar.

There are no private or government middle schools in the village. However, there is a private middle school in Sripani, which is less than 5 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.

There are no private or government secondary schools in the village. However, there is a private secondary school in Sripani, which is less than 5 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.

There are no private or government senior secondary schools in the village. However, there is a private senior secondary school in Sripani, which is less than 5 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.

Colleges in Siripani Ahom Pathar

There are no private or government arts and science degree colleges in the village. However, there is a private arts and science degree college in Maridhal, which is 5-10 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.

There are no private or government engineering colleges in the village. However, there is a private engineering college in Jorhat, which is more than 10 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.

There are no private or government medical colleges in the village. However, there is a private medical college in Dibrugarh, which is more than 10 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.

There are no private or government management institutes in the village. However, there is a private management institute in Dibrugarh, which is more than 10 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.

There are no private or government polytechnic institutes in the village. However, there is a private polytechnic institute in Dibrugarh, which is more than 10 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.

Other Educational Facilities in Siripani Ahom Pathar

There are no private or government vocational training school / ITIs in the village. However, there is a private vocational training school / ITI in Dhemaji, which is more than 10 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.

There are no private or government non formal training centres in the village. However, there is a private non formal training centre in Dhemaji, which is more than 10 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.

There are no private or government differently abled schools in the village. However, there is a private differently abled school in Guwahatai, which is more than 10 kms away from Siripani Ahom Pathar.
